name: Loquat Slab Table

icon.alt: table made of a stump on a cinder block

description: On 2024-12-13, A huge storm hit SF and we got our first ever tornado warning. It took down beautiful bronze loquat tree on our street, a slice of which made the perfect side table.

images.alt: table made of a stump on a cinder block
tree cross-cut into slices on the sidewalk
